name: Review Collect
description: Review Collect helps e-commerce businesses centralize, monitor, and grow their online reputation â€” fully integrated with WhatsApp Business. Our platform routes positive reviews to public channels and sends negative feedback privately via WhatsApp, enabling fast, discreet resolution. With real-time notifications, you stay in control 24/7. The intuitive dashboard organizes reviews by platform, country, and product, while tracking performance against requests sent. Fully customizable WhatsApp review requests let you adapt messages to your brand, send reminders, and build stronger customer relationships, turning every interaction into an opportunity to shine.
